review_text: I do suffer from some foot issues and use heat/shiatsu massage on my feet for circulation issues, but these salts are for relieving pain when dissolved in very warm water in my foot bath/massager.  Okay, news-flash, I am a senior and not as active as I used to be but I am also very aware of keeping good circulation in my feet and making them feel as good as possible - arthritis in several joints means if I can lessen pain anywhere, I'll do that and my feet are important.  I can truly say that these magnesium salts really do make my feet feel so much better when dissolved in the foot bath water.  Because of my knees, I don't take baths any longer, but if I could easily sit down and get back up in the bath tub, I'd definitely try these salts in a nice long soak in the tub - I can imagine my whole body feeling as good as my feet afterwards!  Considering the amount I use in my footbath, this is not a bad price at all either.  When I use up this bag, I will be buying it again.

review_text:
"Best shave I've ever had. Gives me a close shave with no tugging. Better than an electric razor".

That's the first thing my husband had to say after he tested SUPRENT's Matrix Cutter Head travel kit razor for the first time. And what a kit this is. A razor handle, 2-blade refills (each with the first of its kind 6 ultra-thin blades total!), a dock to hold the razor and a bottle of shaving foam are included.

The handle is sleek and heavy but easy and comfortable to hold. The head doesn't pivot but it doesn't need to thanks to the 38.5 degree shaving angle. It glides perfectly along the jaw line and chin areas without missing a spot.

The base is heavy-ish and holds the razor well. Doesn't tip or wobble.

He's not a fan of the shaving foam. Says he must 'really rub it in' in order for it to foam. He used it once and switched back to his regular brand.

Suprent has really come out with an awesome razor kit. The presentation is gorgeous and the product works exceptionally well. Without a doubt this is worthy of gift giving. The price is reasonable.

Highly recommended
title: High Quality Product That Delivers High Quality Results

review_text: These hair clips are very cute. I liked how they were different than normal hair clips, and that it allows you to have three separate sections of hair and can do different styles with it. I have very thick hair, and it held nicely and had a strong grip. Cute set.
title: So cute!

review_text:
These little bottles are exactly what I wanted for hand sanitizer on the go. The silicone bottle is durable and thick, but so easy to squeeze. It isn't going to break and crack like a hard plastic bottle. The cap fits securely and the snap-top stays in place. The carabiner is small, but it's strong enough to keep the bottle where it needs to be as long as there isn't serious weight constantly pulling on it. So far, so good.

The thing I worry about most with a little bottle like this is what happens if you put a lot of pressure on it (sit on it, lean against the wall when it's in a pocket or on a belt loop, etc). I was concerned that the flip top would pop open and I'd end up with hand sanitizer all over the place, but I tested these little guys full of liquid before filling with sanitizer. The pliability of the silicone doesn't allow a burst of pressure to push off the flip top-- not even close. Plus, the top screws tightly into place. It's not going anywhere.

I've been using one of these hanging from my purse strap for the last few days and it is super easy to flip the cap, squeeze out product, and flip the cap closed with one hand. Wish there were other color options, but the functionality and design of these override any concerns about color. I'm so glad I ordered these! They are totally worth the price.
title: Perfect for key chain, purse strap, belt loop

These adorable heart shaped glass cups, with accompanying lids is exactly as shown in the product details pictures. While they are intended for damping or mixing polishes, powders for nail polish/art, they can be used for any other purpose where a small vessel is warranted.

One of the heart cup has a slight defect with the felt paper. It was minor, but I noticed it easily. The glass aspects were fine, with no cracks or defects, though.

review_text:
Skin & Lab Barrierderm Milky Serum Milk Ceramide Complex is a milky serum free of fragrance and alcohol that comes in an easy to use dropper bottle. Ceramides can make skin healthier by strengthening the skin barrier, preventing moisture loss and protecting against environmental damage. Also, ceramides work better combined with certain types of ingredients that are contained in this serum, such as cholesterol, glycerin, squalane (rich in fatty acids) and more.

This serum feels wonderful on my dry, sensitive and mature (55+) skin that needs a lot of hydration and is aggravated easily by chemicals fragrance, natural fragrancing essential oils and extracts, drying alcohol, aggressive products, the environment and so on. I‚Äôve been using this ceramide serum after cleansing and follow with my face cream, but it also layers well with my favorite staples, such as a Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid serum (followed by my moisturizer).

I like that this ceramide serum doesn‚Äôt appear to have any harsh ingredients, and it feels soothing and gentle to my skin. I‚Äôve used it about a week so far and it adds noticeable hydration that isn't heavy, greasy or sticky, and my normally sensitive skin is calm and comfortable. Also, my skin texture feels soft and seems more elastic. I can‚Äôt judge the full benefits yet as that can take many weeks or months, but I‚Äôm pleased so far and will keep using this serum. Love it. 5 stars.
title: Soothing & Skin Feels Less Sensitive, Hydrates & Improves Skin Texture, Free Of Fragrance/Alcohol

review_text:
This is another excellent shaving product from Philips -- it cuts like an ordinary shaver, but with the added benefit of lubrication that helps it to shave smoothly. My skin doesn't get irritated or dry, and the lubrication seems to help the shave to go more quickly. I've tried other brands of shavers and this one seems to work the best.

This package comes with a squeeze bottle full of a very pleasant smelling lotion, that you inject into the back of the shaver. Then, when you are shaving, you just press a button and it releases enough lotion to lubricate about one third of the face. When it starts to feel like a dry shave, you press the button again and finish up.

I have found that the amount of lotion you can inject into the shaver is enough for about 5 to 6 shaves. The shaver comes with a small sample bottle of the lotion -- and I guess one drawback is that you have to keep buying the lotion, unless you want to use this like an ordinary dry shaver. I've tried that too and it seems to work as well as any other shaver I've tried. I prefer, though, to use the lotion. It feels good and has a nice aftershave smell that my wife also likes -- that's good enough for me.

Because the system is water resistant, you can shave in the shower, and you can wash it off in water when you are finished. The extendable trimmer isn't very useful, but I've never seen a shaver where they are. It comes fully recharged and after about two weeks of using it about every other day it is still working well -- I haven't charged it yet. I do wish there was some kind of indicator on the unit that would let me know how much charge remains, but all in all I am quite happy with this.
title: Works great for me -- I like the smell of the lotion, and the smoothness it brings to the shave

[[VIDEOID:4ec0f08a9d346155d134f855861e62]] This tooth cleaning tool - Pick & Pick - measures about 6-1/4 inches long.

At the other end of the tool is a flexible, flat-shaped pick, which I use to scrape unwanted particles and debris from between my gum lines and teeth.

The flat end of the pick is too flexible for me to remove most of the stubborn particles in the areas between my teeth and gums. I needed to hold my fingers as close to the flat end as possible to get good leverage. Even then, I couldn't remove the debris.

The sharp end of the pick works a bit better in removing debris from between my teeth; but for those debris that are really stuck, this pick can't get the debris out because the end keeps flexing.

This tool doesn't do a good job of removing resistant particles/debris from my teeth.

review_text:
Thanks to dry, sensitive skin, I'm always a bit concerned when trying new skin care products. With regards to masks, I've tried some that have worked well, some that caused my skin to burn and some that caused my already dry skin to become even drier. It makes me SO happy to report that I do not experience any negative issues with HUXLEY Secret of the Sahara Clay mask. I would have been crushed if I had experienced a negative reaction because this really is one heck of a clay mask!

Huxley is a nice, gentle mask. But don't let that fool you, it may be gentle but it does a heck of an exceptional job! It applies nice and easy. I let it sit on my skin for 10 minutes before rinsing with lukewarm water, right before its nearly dry. It exfoliates well leaving my skin soft, smooth , a bit brighter and healthy. Dead skin cells are washed away. My skin literally feels GOOD after using Huxley. This mask does have a light scent but it doesn't last long. It is recommended Huxley be used 1-3 times a week. I use it twice a week though I could probably get away with using it only a week because the results Huxley delivers are long lasting.

I'm so relieved I will be able to continue to use this mask on my skin. Silly as it may sound I kind of feel like I'm pampering myself when I use it-it makes my skin feel that GOOD! I will continue to use/purchase Huxley, I'm that satisfied/impressed with what it does for my skin. I absolutely recommend Huxley.
title: Pamper Yourself...

review_text:
I have dry, sensitive and mature (55+) skin and used this Reboncel Aqua Rich Foaming Cleanser daily for about a week. This cleanser has fragrance that smells relatively light to me, though fragrance is an ingredient that poses health risks. I generally avoid foaming face cleansers as they tend to make my skin overly dry, but this has a pleasing creaminess and initially made my skin feel good. It cleaned my skin well yet left it feeling refreshed, soft and comfortable after use.

After using this wash more than a few days in a row, it felt more clarifying (better for oily skin) than hydrating to my skin. While it didn‚Äôt strip my skin or make it visibly irritated, by the end of the week my skin just didn‚Äôt feel as comfortable as it did at first and it felt like my skin would end up too dry if I continued daily use. So I switched back to my creamy, hydrating cleansers, but felt this cleanser would still be good to use as needed as a clarifying cleanser.

However, while this wash has some good ingredients such as Centella Asiatica, Aloe Extract and Sodium Hyaluronate, this has controversial Triethanolamine (‚ÄúTEA‚Äù) high on the ingredient list. It‚Äôs on my personal list of ingredients to avoid after reading many articles about it and seeing it on lists of risky chemical by many sources. Some sources say it‚Äôs safe in amounts we get thru cosmetics, but I‚Äôm concerned about the cumulative effect of risky chemicals.

TEA is a nitrosamine used to generate foam and adjust pH and is likely a hormone disrupter and irritant. But the bigger issue for me is that TEA gets absorbed through the skin and reacts with other chemicals to form the carcinogen NDEA. While less risky in rinse off products, it still poses more risk than I‚Äôm comfortable with. The problem is that I have no way to know if this cleanser or any product I‚Äôm using with it has chemicals that react with TEA.

So, for me, I find it best to avoid all products with TEA, especially since so many alternative products are available that don‚Äôt have it. I also dislike that this has so much Cocamidopropyl Betaine (second ingredient), which I generally avoid mostly due contamination concerns. Fragrance also poses health risks, though it‚Äôs a common ingredient I don‚Äôt avoid altogether (but I do try and minimize use). All things considered, this is just okay for me. 3 stars.
title: Pleasant But Feels More Clarifying Than Hydrating To My Dry Skin-Has Risky Ingredient TEA

review_text:
I‚Äôve tried so many at home IPL devices and have gotten hair removal at salons. The thing you need to check for is the power of each laser. For instance many cheap IPL will say there joules rating is between 2-6 joules typically. At salons it varies but it‚Äôs typically between 20-50 joules. And that means the higher the joules usually the better the results or faster because it‚Äôs actually hitting the hair with that higher power.

This IPL device has 5 levels between 6-20 joules. That is typically as high as you‚Äôll find for at home IPL devices. So at the highest level you‚Äôll get the low end of salon quality laser removal.

Be very careful with the higher levels though, just because it can reach that power doesn‚Äôt mean it will be the best result for your skin. So be careful, follow directions and make sure to not damage your skin
title: Powerful! It‚Äôs in the joules rating!

review_text: I have oily/combo skin and I am always on the hunt for some good powders. This powder is super finely milled, very soft, and great at setting my face makeup without making it more cakey. Bonus, there is no fragrance whatsoever (you would be surprised how many powders I have come across with a scent). However, this does not extend the longevity of my makeup wear. It did not hold back my oily complexion and it while it did make my skin look soft at the beginning of the day, by the end my skin looked a little more textured than it already does. So, I think for me, this powder is a no-go but someone else may have better luck with it.

review_text:
The scrubber tip on this tube of cleanser sounded like a great idea, so I ordered it. I‚Äôve used charcoal face products on my very dry, sensitive skin in the past with no irritation or reaction & this one is fine, too. Cleans, rinses well, moisturizes a bit.

BUT ‚Äî the angled tip has teeny nylon bristles that are actually too short. You squeeze the tube to push some product onto the surface & gently ‚Äúscrub‚Äù your face with it. The problem is that the bristles are so short that it just feels like a plastic disc massage! No matter how gently or firmly I applied it, the result was the same - rubbing creamy gray cleanser across my face with a circle of hard plastic.

In theory, this idea is good but the actual design of the tip does not work for me.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it‚Äôs Helpful!**
title: Scrubber feature is better in theory than in practice - NOPE! Cleanser is fine‚Ä¶

review_text:
I am not sure what this spray is supposed to do.
"texture spray" apparently makes your hair "gritty" according to the can.
It is also supposed to absorb oil, so I suppose it's a deshiner.
On the product page it reads:
"This weightless dry texture spray for hair provides a manageable and light hold without the crunch. It has long staying power and keeps your hairstyle in place without looking or feeling stiff"
Consequently, I thought this would be like a light hairspray, but it's really not.
It smells nice and is easy to apply, but does not hold my hair.

In the end, I feel like this is sort of a body enhancer and mattifier, so maybe more like a waterless shampoo?
Honestly, even after using this I am still not sure.
I feel like this is going to work best for anyone with oily hair who wants to absorb the oiliness to give their hair more lift.
Where I think this really falls down is in holding hair, as well as clearly and consistently describing what it's for.
title: I remain confused

review_text: Product comes in a small fabric pouch containing 100 individually sealed compact paper masks. The masks are folded in such a way that they're compressed to the size of 2 nickels stacked on top of each other. That said once you get the hang of it they provide a decent and cost friendly way to get a homemade lotion mask treatment.

review_text:
I was a little confused when I got this leave-in because I was expecting a bottle with a pump and instead I got a tub with product all over the place.
This leave-in cream is very runny, fruity scent a little too strong for me. Although after I applied it into my hair, it wasn't that bad.
I have incorporated a few times now into my regular routine (shampoo, conditioner, leave-in, curl cream and gel) and it has worked well so far. Hair feels soft and define. The way I applied it was on damp hair, making sure product was evenly distributed.
One thing to consider when using it, is not to apply too much product on your hair, I used about 2 dime size on all my hair. For thin hair I would recommend half of it, otherwise hair will look very greasy.
Lastly, ingredients are very good for your hair. I have been following the Curly Girl Method (CGM) for about 6 months and one of the major recommendations is to avoid parabens, silicones, sulfates, non-water soluble waxes and drying alcohols, and all ingredients in this leave-in are safe to use if you are following the CGM as well.
title: Different container, soft hair, CGM approved

review_text:
I don't know about you, but our household goes through nail clippers fast. Most of the time they don't cut right, or they just don't last. Toenail clippers- well it is even harder to find a decent pair. Let's see how this set measured up for us..

WHAT IS THIS NAIL CLIPPER SET LIKE?
This set comes with a hefty set of nail clippers. It says it is for fingernails and toenails. More on that in a minute. The clipper comes with a catch all for the clippings. It also comes with a faux leather snap shut case that also houses a nail file.

HOW DO THESE CLIPPER PERFORM?
These clippers are surprinsingly nice. I tried them on both finger and toe nails and they worked very well. I did not get any ragged edges, or dull bent nails or anything else that I usually have problems with regarding most clippers. I did even have good results on the thickest nail which is on the largest toe.

WHO MIGHT NOT BENEFIT BY THESE CLIPPERS?'
The only person I would think would not benefit from these are those who deal with very thick elderly nails. Those need special clippers.

THE NAIL FILE
The nail file is nice, very fine grade of file, this files nails decently. The tip is not overly great at cleaning under the nail but it works okay.

THE BOTTOM LINE
This nail clipper seems to work well on finger and toe nails not having any trouble with ragged edges or dull bending of nails. The enclosed case is great in that it keeps the file and clippers together.

MY RATING
FIVE STARS. I like the whole set although the nail file could be a bit better.
title: FINALLY Truly Nice Toenail Clippers & Bonuses

review_text:
Since I recently requested and started using a Gel Polish kit, I found myself in need of some gel polish remover tools, so I requested this product from Vine. This review is for: Nail Polish Gel Remover Tools Kit for Women with Nail Clip Caps, Nail File, Nail Remover Cotton Pads,Brush, 2-in-one Cuticle Scraper/Pusher.

First things first, I was surprised to come here to write this review and discover that I received no dispenser bottle as listed and pictured in the product description. Since this kit does NOT come with the remover liquid, you are going to have to buy some acetone. (In my state, you must be 21 to buy it.) Since this came with no bottle, I followed the directions on the acetone itself, and used a glass measuring cup in which to pour it. (This way if I didn't use it all, I could easily pour it back into the bottle. Note to self, buy another measuring cup!)

With that out of the way, this kit worked as described. I used tweezers and soaked the little pads in acetone and then wrapped it around my nail and applied the clamp. I did this to all of my nails at once, because my husband was here to help me with the second hand. If you have no one to help you, then you're going to need to do each hand separately. It is impossible to do much with these clamps on your fingernails. Once the clamps are on, you need to wait at least 20 minutes before removing them, to soften up the polish.

Once I removed the clamps I set to work scraping off the polish. It does NOT come right up like regular polish does, but if you've soaked them for 20 minutes, and you applied it in thin layers when you originally polished them, it's easy to scrape the rest of it off. Once you're done, your nails look pretty bad. It will be necessary to buff them out and then wash them and apply some moisturizing lotion because your nails and the tips of your fingers will be very, very dry.

I have heard some real horror stories of people trying to get gel nails and gel nail polish off, but this kit made it much easier and alleviated my fears. Other than the missing dispenser bottle, I'm rather happy with this kit.
title: Good Kit, But No Bottle and You Will Need Acetone

Directions are provided on the box and easy to follow. After using the products my skin feels nourished and hydrated. The consistency is lightweight and absorbs quickly. review_text:
This was my first time trying shampoo or conditioner in bar form, and I had the opportunity to try both from this company's line of products. My first impressions were very positive - the ingredients looked clean and natural, as well as being cruelty-free and vegan, I love that it‚Äôs plastic free (both the lack of bottle and the packaging), and that the scent options were relatively gender neutral. The bars were a little smaller than I expected, but ergonomically they fit comfortably in the palm of my hand and don't seem to be shrinking too fast after a week or so of use. I'm glad that they have different colors, so that I can differentiate between my bar soap, shampoo, and conditioner!

My experience using them was pretty good. It felt odd at first as I've only ever used bottled products, but quickly got used to it and could definitely see myself using more bars in the future. I tried both running the conditioner bar down my hair and lathering it up a little in my hand and applying that way. Between the two, I felt that I got pretty good coverage and results. My hair felt less tangled and I was able to work a brush through pretty easily once I got out the shower. When my hair dried, it seemed softer and healthier looking than it had previously, and my curls had a little more life to them.

I only have two concerns - the first is that I'm struggling to find a place to put the bars in my shower where they won't get misted by water and disintegrate more quickly that way. The second is the smell. Although it's not unpleasant, it reminded me a little of a scented candle, and was very strong. Three different people commented on the smell of my hair that week, which is not something that usually happens to me. My husband thought that I smelled like cologne! I could see this being a pro or a con depending on how you feel about fragrances. Personally, I found it overwhelming as I'm more on the sensitive side to smells.

Overall, I would consider trying this or a similar product again in the future, but only with a less intense scent.
title: Strong fragrance

review_text:
I‚Äôve used kneipp‚Äôs body wash before. I liked the product so much I wanted to try body lotion version. I have pretty bd anxiety, also have trouble falling asleep at night time. I think this lavender body lotion has been helping me falling asleep faster than usual.
The smell is very natural, (not sweet or artificial) you can smell the pure lavender scent from the lotion. The lotion‚Äôs consistency is slightly runny but not liquidy.
Overall, this product has been helping me falling asleep, I even apply during the day to my arms and hands because the lotion smells so good. If you‚Äôre looking for a natural scented body lotion, this would be appropriate. I would recommend this product. Plus, Kneipp doesn‚Äôt test on animal.
title: Lovely smell helps sleeping, anxiety

review_text: This was my first time using a foot peel, so I feel like this product didnt provide enough information for first time users. Directions said to put booties on feet. I wasnt sure if i should take them out of the plastic, so i didnt because there was alot of liquid in them. The packets also said to not use if you are breastfeeding or pregnant so that was concerning - not sure what is in it or how it effects milk, but i still pump for my daughter. I kept these securely on my feet for the directed amount of time and then took them off and took a shower. A couple days later my right foot started to peel first but got really itchy so i think i scratched off some of the peeling skin. The description says it will peel in about a week and leave skin smooth but my whole foot didnt peel and I still have patches of dried skin and calluses. Idk if I was suppose to keep socks/ slippers off  during this time but it didnt completely work for me for whatever reason. Maybe if they provided a more detailed instruction process I couldve been more successful?

review_text:

It smoothed my fly always down and once dry (it goes on wet), everything stayed in place despite some light winds. It won‚Äôt work in heavy wind, but it provides a light hold that isn‚Äôt crunchy.

It won‚Äôt hold big pieces, and it doesn‚Äôt last all day. But having said that, it lasts a long time in normal circumstances. Keep it in your purse for touch ups.

review_text:
This comes with minimal packaging, which I appreciate (I hate getting some tiny little item in some big box!). This comes in cute little pink bubble mailer. It‚Äôs come with a pump. This is made in the US. It‚Äôs ‚ÄúKorean inspired, American made.‚Äù It has no parabens, fragrances, GMO, or allergens, and is cruelty free.

The pump works well. It disperses a good amount of product, but not too much. The product is a nice, thin cream. It glides onto the skin easily, absorbs quickly, and doesn‚Äôt leave any sticky or tacky feeling or residue of any kind.

This has a lot of good ingredients like organic aloe, hyaluronic acid, jojoba, Shea butter, and retinol. These good ingredients are high on the list of ingredients too.

Overall, I think this is a great product. It feels good on the skin and my skin feels hydrated. It isn‚Äôt too pricey and a little goes a long way. I can‚Äôt speak to any long term results since I haven‚Äôt been using it long. But, so far I like it. I would recommend trying this!

review_text: These are just what I need to keep some loose hairs around my face from flying around and getting into my eyes.  I played a tennis match yesterday and the wind was just ferocious. review_text:
I‚Äôve had this for several months now. And I know I‚Äôm an amazon vine member so a lot of people will scoff at my review but I‚Äôm being totally honest here. Does it work for cellulite? I‚Äôm not sure. I feel like it does and it sort of looks like it. But I‚Äôve only been applying once a day instead of twice like it says. It feels very firming though and so moisturizing, I also don‚Äôt spend too much time massaging like I should.

To be honest, at first trying, I didn‚Äôt want to really use it. I didn‚Äôt like the smell. But after finally trying it, I LOVE it! The smell dissipates after a few minutes. You don‚Äôt smell all menthol like. It actually smells pleasant after a few minutes. Trust me, I would hate anything menthol on skin smelling. If you have trouble with the pump, it‚Äôs not the pump, it‚Äôs just really rich and thick and is a little harder to pump out. It moisturizes better than even a name brand popular lotion. And stays with you like that for 24 hours. Yet it doesn‚Äôt feel too thick or cakey.

My favorite part and what I think it should be advertised for is arthritis or other autoimmune stuff that causes aches and pains. Anyone with fibromyalgia would want to own stock in this stuff. Hot flashes, this is your freedom. It leaves you cool and refreshed. I feel even cleaner. It‚Äôs great in summer. Feels like your own personal air conditioner. This helps my joint aches so much you can‚Äôt believe. It‚Äôs better than diclofenac gel.

The pads are dry, some sort of resealable envelope would have worked just fine. I'd even be appeased if there were a refill package available. But I don't see one.

The pads are easy to use. They do a phenomenal job cleaning - and I used it after taking a 3mi walk on a 90deg day with sunscreen on. My face felt clean, soft and toned when I was done. No residue, no slime, pores seemed smaller. Amazing product.

It is supposed to be fragrance-free and there's definitely not a perfume element - but maybe there should be, It smelled weird to me. review_text:

Scent starts off as clean laundry, then comes a little cedar spice, ending with a sweet vanilla...Combined for what I personally wouldn't call "manly" but more of a "man who is trying to smell good"... Performance is okay. The balm is very fluffy ad soft like coconut butter. It doesn't tame as much as I like but softens and gives a nice glow.

Overall I want to hate on this but just can't... I can see why some might hate the cologne smell, it's quite strong and different from the dozens of balms I've reviewed... BUT if you like wearing cologne, you'll love this. It's a bit high in price but hey, you'll be saving in cologne price.

review_text:
These come in a ziplock bag. The extensions are each packaged in plastic individually there‚Äôs a rubber band holding them together. There was also a pair of false eyelashes.

You get 2 of each color - red, sky blue, green, baby pink, yellow, royal blue, lilac, hot pink, and neon yellow. I think it‚Äôs a good assortment of colors.

They don‚Äôt seem to have much hair in each extension. They seem kind of thin. I show a photo of one of the hot pink extensions, you can see how thin it is. It would be nice if they had more hair. I like that they‚Äôre longer, so I could trim them to fit my length.

They don‚Äôt come with any kind of care instructions. The product info page says they are heat resistant, but doesn‚Äôt say max temperature. The way they came, the extensions ended up being crimped in a few spots, so I straightened the crimped areas out. I used an extremely low temp and it was fine.

Overall, I think getting 18 pieces for $9.99 (at the time of writing this review), it‚Äôs a good deal. Just know that each clip doesn‚Äôt have much hair - they‚Äôre pretty thin. But, mixing them in your hair, they mix in well and look good for a fun addition to your look that isn‚Äôt permanent.

review_text:
I tend to have a built up of callus on my feet and have always used a manual grinder to thin down the callus and smooth it out. When I found out this product existed, I was very intrigued.

Not only does this product help me reduce my callus, it also includes different tips with a wide variety of different functions such as nail filing and nail polishing. It is pretty small and portable, and the use of a USB connection makes it more versatile. Also something to note if you are interested is the fact that this grinder does not make too much noise.

Now to talk a little about what the product could improve on, the inclusion of a wall plug would have been nice. I imagine most people have some sort of access to a USB plug but if you do not, you are going to need to buy one. One other issue to point out is that the length of the cord could ideally be a little longer. You can use an extension to mitigate this problem or just sit near a USB connection.

Overall this product does what it advertises. If you are trying to look for something that will help you save time this will help you do that. I cannot speak about the long term durability of this product, but what I can say is that I have been using it for a couple of weeks and have not ran into any issues. Overall I give this product a 4 out of 5 stars. It is a great product to consider and if some of the flaws I pointed out were not present, I would give it 5 out of 5 stars.
title: A tool I never knew I needed!

review_text: I like these blenders. They help blend my foundation much better than cotton pads or by just using my fingers. These would also be great for weekend getaways where you‚Äôll have one less heavy thing (perfume bottle) to pack. title: no more lugging around a heavy bottle of perfume / body spray

review_text: This is a small oil diffuser than others I have seen or used but it is very nice and looks better in person than in pictures. The light design is nice but too much for me when I‚Äôm sleeping. You have to turn off the whole thing to turn the lights off. You can turn on the diffuser without lights but once on I can only get them off by turning off the diffuser. It lasts almost through the night maybe 6 hours? I find taking off the ceramic cover easier than covers of other diffusers. I use this for just my bedroom so it is perfect. I did not come with a measuring cup for water, this is unusual but I had an extra so no big deal.
title: Very Small but nice

review_text: I've been in the market for a microneedling device for a while now, but I wasn't sure if I needed something super expensive or if I could get away with a more budget-friendly option. I decided to try two super inexpensive versions , both costing around $20 and see if this significantly more expensive option from GloPRO was really worth it. In short, yes. Both of the cheaper options were incredibly painful and flimsy feeling. One of them even felt kind of like getting a face tattoo. It was awful. The GloPRO option actually feels nice on the skin because of the vibration feature and the red light therapy is a huge benefit for those monthly breakouts. I do feel like my skin care is absorbing more effectively since I've been using this, but it's still an extremely expensive tool. If you really want a microneedling device, in my opinion this is worth the investment, however, I don't think it's a necessary item.
title: Super pricey, but much better than the budget-friendly alternatives

review_text: If you have smaller hands this will be difficult to maneuver. While I was using it to attempt to remove my fake tan in the shower it rolled all around and slid around making it difficult to actually target areas. I ended up getting frustrated and balling it up in my fist to use it like a loofah. Being so used to traditional green scrub cloths this hardly did anything. It didn't really remove dry skin or my tan for that matter.
title: Ill fitting

review_text: No more dark circles around the eyes. Use it everyday and you will see a small difference. Small is better than nothing at all.
title: Good eye cream

review_text: great nail polish
title: Great nail polish

review_text:
I hate blow drying my hair. I wish this brush magically made me enjoy it, but alas, I will forever hate it. However, I do love the results that I get with this brush. My hair dries smooth and the brush is easy to hold and use. It‚Äôs lightweight which makes it comfortable to use, but the product is high quality. After several weeks of use there are no signs of use in the brush.
I love this brand and this brush is no exception!
title: Great brush!

review_text: This is a really fun little gadget. Take small sections of hair and stick in the opening. Hold down button and it coils your hair in and curls it. No tangling, no burning fingers. Can switch the curls to curl left or right. I get about an hour out of the battery before it needs recharged. That's enough time to curl my entire head of hair. Not only is it portable, it can also be used for an extra Powerbank, to charge your phone if your on the go and need a boost and have this with you!!!
title: Curls really good!

review_text: I've struggled with cystic acne for most of my teens through adulthood. I recently found that hyaluronic acid works  best to not only clear my skin, but keep it clear. The WIS line of skincare products has helped keep my skin healthy and free of breakouts for several months now. These masks have helped immensely. They tackle the breakouts at the source, while moisturizing my skin and not building up oils. These masks are lightweight and feel sheer enough to allow my skin to breathe. They are still thick enough to lock in treatment and the medication. For the price, these are a fantastic deal and last me for a little more than a month since I only use them twice a week. Overall, if you are like me and struggle with difficult skin, these are worth a try.
title: A mask that helps keep my skin free of blemishes

review_text:
The marketing blurb says, among other things "this advanced man face care formula features stem cells to help revive the skin and smooth out imperfections".
Well... stem cells, if they were actually somehow harvested, in a cosmetics container, mixed with various other chemicals and ingredients would necessarily be dead and therefore completely irrelevant. And, of course, the stem cells would help address things such as diabetes and repair of heart muscle following heart attack, not zits on one's face. Not to mention that they would need to be live and 'human' cells. So, I am quite confident that the 'stem cells' claim is untrue and, even if it were true, the presence of dead stem cells in a cream would make zero difference.
Other than that, the cream is thick and, as other reviewer found, it has an aggressive smell that reminded me of Noxzema. So I would never use it during the day. At night, it would probably be Okay if used by men who sleep alone.
title: If you sleep alone

review_text: I really like this one. I think it‚Äôs pretty cute. The part actually looks pretty legit. The color is on point. I like the length and the density. The roots are pretty shiny though, wish they made it more matte. The hair could be softer too. But for the price it‚Äôs really cute and I think I might wear this one out.
title: So cute

review_text: muy bonitas y gran variedad de colores.
title: Bonitas

review_text: This is so great for use with essential oils. I have a daily essential oil regimen and these bottles really came in handy so now I am able to whip up larger batches. I use the other bottle spray on my plants. I love these bottles, great quality. I usually get the smaller ones but glad I got these.
title: Great for essential oils

review_text: This product was a great idea, but for me, it was hard to use. They provide plenty of stencils for your eyebrows, but holding the stencil up and applying the stamp was hard for me. Also, it didn't apply evenly.
title: Great Idea, not easy to use

review_text: I wish my own hair felt as amazing as this! It‚Äôs sooo soft and silky. The color is GORGEOUS. Darker roots than blend right into a medium to light brown. The color is not as streaky as depicted in the product image and I‚Äôm happy about that. It looks way more natural in person. High end hair, just perfect. Thank you! I‚Äôd recommend!

review_text: These makeup sponges are great. Lately i‚Äôve preferred using a brush to apply foundation but these sponges make me want to go back to beauty blenders. They are great for blending my eye primer and foundation but I prefer them for when I am baking my face. I like that this comes with 4 beauty blenders so you do not have to constantly be washing your only one. The packaging is also very cute and very gift-able in my opinion. I recommend these for people who like to use beauty blenders or even to include in a makeup gift basket.

review_text: This curler crimps your hair with little crimps, similar to the kind you could get if you braided your hair into tiny braids while it was wet and then took them out when it was dry.  Except it is much faster!  It is easy to use, and creates a lot of volume.  The crimper is a mini size, so dont expect it to be full size, it is very small, good for small hands, and travel.
title: cute crimps

review_text: The color is awesome but everything else about this wig is bad. It‚Äôs super thin and not evenly cut. The hair feels dry and kinda brittle. It‚Äôs not sewn in well at the hairline and the cap doesn‚Äôt fit my 22Inch mannequin head. I can‚Äôt recommend this.
title: Pretty color but poor quality

review_text: These are beautiful and glamorous lashes. They are wispy and fluffy, even from the side you can see the different lengths and textures. The band is pretty thick, and that can be problematic. I suggest bending the band with your fingers to soften it up and for it to bend to your eye shape better. I have pretty big eyes so I did not have to bend it but you can make these adjustments. If you put it on straight out of the box the inner or outer corner may not stick closely or on the eye lid or nah begin to lift.
title: Glamorous

review_text: I really like this shower cap, it fits perfect and the colors and tropical pattern is beautiful. This style cap fits so comfortable doesn‚Äôt slide off. Great material and just the right thickness.
title: So pretty great quality

review_text: I've been buying AOA beauty blenders directly from their website for years. They're my favorite. They hold up very well thru many washings and blend my makeup beautifully. They get quite large when wet, so I can apply my foundation quickly and blend effortlessly. I highly recommend these beauty blenders.

review_text:
This is a nice inexpensive body wash. It comes in very nice packaging to be honest and makes for a great gift, especially with the holidays coming up. They also have the matching body lotion and all. The body wash comes in a generous bottle that has a pump dispenser on the top that makes it very easy to use especially when you are in the shower.

The body wash has a nice fragrance that is very pleasant. It does linger while you are in the shower but once you are all rinsed off, sadly it doesn‚Äôt last too long after that. The body wash does produce a decent lather but sadly it is not too luxurious. All in all for the price that you are paying, which is less than $15, this is a pretty nice find.
title: Very nice body wash

review_text:
I love the fragrance. It has a woody/oaky scent to me and is very sexy. I love that the scent not overly sweet, a very mature perfume. My husband loves it. I am not very good at discerning notes. This fragrance describes the top notes as bergamot, pear, black currant, pink pepper. Heart/Middle notes are tuberose, muguet, jasmine sambac, and licorice. Base notes are described as cocoa, vanilla and tonka. I can slightly smell the vanilla and bergamot...the others I‚Äôm not so good at that.

It has pretty good longevity and dries down to a "warm" fragrance. Has decent sillage as well, only one spray will do.
Love this fragrance! It just smells so good!
title: Sexy fragrance in a sexy bottle.

review_text: These wipes are really large. The fabric is strong and soft. It has a nice clean scent and cleans well when you are in a pinch. They are individually wrapped for easy portability and convenience.
title: Great

review_text: The lazy susan organizer looks decent enough but the acrylic feels very flimsy and came with scratch marks in several places. There was something sticky on one of the rectangle panels. When I removed the residue, left behind was a large hazy etched area. The instructions were easy but the little o rings that you use to secure the unit were awkward to attach on the top piece. I don‚Äôt trust that the shelves can take any weight without cracking so I will only put heavy items on the bottom.
title: Several Complaints But I Still Like It

review_text:
These headphones have really decent quality for some budget headphones. The sound is pretty clear coming through and the ear pieces are super cushy.

Unfortunately, where these headphones fall short for me is the fit. They don‚Äôt fit snug at all, it‚Äôs almost as if the ear pieces just hang off the top of my ears. It‚Äôs definitely usable, but loose fitting in my opinion.

Other than that, they are pretty monster headphones, so just be sure you‚Äôre ready to be wearing size huge. I honestly wouldn‚Äôt have a problem with the size of the headphones if they fit better. I‚Äôm too afraid to make sudden movements because they feel like they will slip off.
title: Comfortable, but loose fitting

review_text:
The order of the face masks come packaged in a box. There are 24 face masks individually packaged. The mask comes with a clear plastic layer underneath that's folded up with the face mask. This allows for the face mask to be easily removed andn opened, because other products just have the face mask folded up by itself and it's always a struggle to unfold them.

The face mask is a perfect fit for my face. There are plenty of face masks out there that are oversized or does not have the slits in the right place to fit the face form, but I could tell the fit would be perfect the moment I put them on.

The face masks are soaked in hyaluronic acid and there was plenty left in the package after the face mask was removed, for me to squeeze additional gel onto my face. I left the face mask on for about 15 minutes. The area around my nose and cheeks still had plenty of moisture on it but the edges near the chin were dried up. The face mask seems to harden in the areas that are dried up.

After the application, my skin did not absorb all the serum and it was still wet. I gently tapped around the area to get it evenly spread and dissolve. The skin felt moisturized. It wasn't sticky nor did it dry up my face. I am satisfied with the result and the product.
title: Good Face Mask for Moisturization

review_text: I have used the Kolua brand wax on many occasions and it is always a dependable product. You get a solid full bag with good size beads for a good price. This is a refill pkg so it comes with a few sticks. They have other sets you can get that comes with more accessories if you need them and all are well made. This size bag will last me 4-6 waxing sessions for legs and underarms.
title: Good all around brand and product.

review_text: This kit has almost everything you could need as a new parent, or a good refill kit for your toddler. The shampoo/body foam is light and cleanses gently, but completely. The lotion is super hydrating, but lightweight and doesn't leave your skin greasy. The oil is nice for a heavier moisturizing treat, it is calming at night. The wipes are great when you are out and about, they are good at getting sticky messes cleaned up. Everything has no scent and just feels really gentle.
title: Great kit for new parents

review_text: Nice wig. Very pink very fluffy and works great for spirit days and cosplays
title: Great wig

review_text: Soft stretchy material with buttons that are a decent size without being obnoxiously large.  Does not scream 'MASK ACCESSORY'!  My teenager is very happy with them
title: Nice headbands

review_text: I got these to help when removing gel nail polish.  I was kind of disappointed because the clips don't stay in place on some of my fingers, especially my thumbs.  When using, I had to keep my hands very still in order to keep them for coming off to make sure the clips with the remover does what it's supposed to do.
title: Just okay

review_text: This 2-pack of Natural Amor Candles is a real treasure.  The scents are wonderful and relaxing, reminiscent of walking through a forest or field and breathing in "nature".  The candles are made of 100% Soy wax (the best) and scented with natural Essential Oils of Lavender and Balsam Fir.  What's nice about these is the subtleness of the fragrances, but yet, still very aromatic - no sweet flowery smell, just nature!  The candles come in very substantial round metal tins and lids, about 2 1/4" high, and 3" across.  Each candle has 2 wicks sticking up out of the creamy white wax.  These together or separate would make a nice gift for anyone that would enjoy an alternative to a floral aromatherapy.....a very nice and different, calming experience.
title: Two excellent scents worth trying - back to nature.

review_text: I am loving this combo curling iron. I have used other curling/straightening irons in the past but most are barely adequate for either task. But this one is intelligently designed and excels at both. Switching between curling and straightening is easy - there is a "C" button on one side of the handle and an "S" button on the opposite side to engage each task. The curling clasp holds my long hair securely as does the straightening iron. Two features that are great are the long swivel cord and the fact that this is dual voltage - that is a feature that is getting harder to find on hair appliances. I travel a lot and like that I only need to bring one hair tool with me, whether in the US or abroad. Even at home it is great to not have to heat up two different tools if I need to curl parts of my hair and straighten others. And the price is really affordable for something of this quality and with so many features. Certainly the best I have used for either straightening or curling that I can remember. This also includes a travel case which is a nice bonus.
title: Excellent dual purpose, dual voltage hair appliance

review_text: Pretty costly for such a small amount. I got 3 masks out of this small container, so that about $13 per mask. There was a lack of safety seal on mine which makes me question the product. Did I see a big difference between this expensive mask and one that costs less? Nope, not even alittle difference. While I do like companies that are about being all natural, there are cheaper options that do the same. Very unlikely I would reorder this.
title: Small amount an expensive mask

review_text:
These come in a cute little red product box sealed with plastic wrapping. The back has a sticker on the plastic wrapping that has the ingredients listed (see photos). The box has ‚ÄúTo be a sexy lady surprise yourself‚Äù on the front along with a red heart sticker that seals the lid and says ‚ÄúSurpise!‚Äù Then, under that it says ‚ÄúShe Loves‚Äù and below that says ‚ÄúTrue Love Classic Velvet Lip Gloss.‚Äù It‚Äôs really cute outer packaging. Once you remove the outer plastic wrapping, the back of the box just has a bunch of Chinese writing (see photos), so I like they at least put that sticker on the back on the outside of the plastic wrapping.

The tubes are really small, but cute. They are a kind of matte white with ‚ÄúSHE LOVES‚Äù written in silver holographic letters going all around the top. The caps are matte and the color of shade of lipstick, and the bottom of each tube has a sticker that‚Äôs the color of the shade of lipstick and the number for the shade. The caps twist off and there‚Äôs a doe foot applicator. For some reason when I first went to open one, I pulled on the cap. It came right off, revealing a black cap (see photos). Luckily the cap cover went right back on and stayed on without issues. But, kind of weird it comes off like that. Like it‚Äôs not glued on or something? So, of course, I then had to see if they all pulled off like that....they did (see photos). 2 of them I thought weren‚Äôt going to come off (I was just pulling lightly, I didn‚Äôt want to force them off), but then they came off too. But, again, I‚Äôm just glad they went back on and stayed on without issue.

The tubes are small, so the doe foot applicators are small (see photos). The doe foot applicators are thin, longer rectangle shape, flat on each side. I liked them. They were small, but still easy enough to handle.

The colors are all extremely pigmented. They are all nice and smooth. They go on evenly. They don‚Äôt take long to dry. They last a good amount of time.

The only downside I see is the tubes are white, so they can get dirty easy. If you have them in your purse or makeup drawer, they will probably end up getting dirty. Also, the caps coming off like they do, like they aren‚Äôt glued on good. But other than that, I think it‚Äôs a really cute set!
title: Beautiful Shades! Good Formula!

review_text: This is my first time using a zigzag style bristle brush. It pulls my hair and scratches my scalp. I don't recommend it if you have a sensitive scalp.
title: Pulls my hair and scratches my scalp

review_text: This is a no for me. This wig came very curly and not of an afro type. Even after combing and brushing, it was still not an afro. review_text: If you never tried this brand before, this is the best way to give their popular products a try. It came with a beautiful bag and  5 different skincare products, a cleanser, serum, moisturizer, eye cream, and a mist! They all basically promote different skin issues but for the most part targets fine lines, wrinkles, aging spots, and improve dull-looking skin. Everything here works well together but can be used separately as well depending on your skincare routine. So happy with this set!

review_text: These are very soothing to my sensitive skin. I think it‚Äôs a little toward the expensive side, but I do really like it. When I have more disposable income I‚Äôd definitely order again.

review_text: I had never tried anything for my skin consisting of pomegranate, so I was anxious to try this. It actually is an entire skin care regimine containing a cleanser, a toner, a facial cream, an eye cream and overall moisurizers. I actually was quite surprised how well this worked from start to finish. It was nice having an entire skin care routine in one package (instead of me working with various separate products. Fragrance is light and smells almost apple-like (but very light). I particularly like the cleanser and the toner. It also comes in a beautiful gift box so this would make a wonderful gift for someone. I bought another for my mother-in-law and plan to give it to her when we visit next month. Highly recommend!

review_text: Easy to braid

review_text: I have a hard time committing to different hair color changes so wigs help fulfill my color obsessions without the commitment. This wig is soo much fun! This wig also comes with a wig cap. I have extremely long hair and this wig does a great job holding and hiding it. Love it. Would recommend

review_text: I got this for multiple uses. I can put it on the back of my neck or temples for headaches. I can roll it on my face for depuffing with some facial oil. It's chilly but feels really nice. I would use something smaller for the under eye area but it does the rest of my face nicely.  I thought the material of the roller would be more of a soft, squishy texture but its not. Thats fine, just a little outside of what I imagined. It would also work well on a burn or sore muscles. Its easiy to wash and rinse clean before putting it right back in the freezer. Overall, I think this is an awesome thing to keep in the freezer!

review_text:
Coming from a total Makeup Klutz, this product is - fantastic??!
I don't always wear foundation or pressed powder or anything to cover everything, but I really should.
Had an event on Sat. that I stepped it up for & tried this... long story short, IT WORKS.
I washed & lotioned my face as usual, then waited an hour or so to let it totally absorb.
Sprayed this & let it dry.
Applied a cream foundation that I've used before but, this time, it seemed to spread more evenly & easily and it looked really smooth & nice!
Received husband compliments & girlfriends at event compliments!
Whatever the magic is in this spray bottle, I'll be sure to keep it on hand.
title: Amazing stuff!

review_text: This hair comb is stunning! Very beautiful. The delicate wires can be manipulated and slightly adjusted to show the comb better. It‚Äôs a medium weight and the combs won‚Äôt hold my thick hair; but if I style it in an updo, then I can put the combs into the updo to stay better. It won‚Äôt comb much hair into a style securely with thick hair like mine, so I definitely have to use other tasters and than place this for beauty over function. Delicate and lovely for an all out dress up day. Love it!

review_text: I have a headband collection and loved the look of these with the pretty jeweled flowers.  They look great and add some pizazz to my outfits.  They are heavier than regular headbands so be prepared for that.  Other than that, they are well made and pretty colors.  This makes a great gift too!

review_text: So the container itself isn't very big and I wish there was more. I have bleach blonde hair that is very thin but I have a lot of it. I have to use quite a bit of product to get it to cover my entire head. It is very thick so you really have to use a ton of product. I use it twice a week and let it sit for 10 minutes before washing out. I have noticed that my hair isn't as frizzy and I don't have as many fly aways when I wear my hair up. The scent is very fresh and light; husband approved. My reason for the 4/5 stars is just because I was anticipating much more product than I received.

review_text: This wax is a beautiful color. I tried a few different  brands before this one and its my favorite. It melted evenly in my wax pot. Worked well without causing any skin irritation. I used it on my legs without any problems. Its a large 2lb bag.

review_text: Himalayan pink salt seems to be everywhere nowadays. Lamps, healing crystals and now shampoo. I don't ascribe any great benefits to this salt, other than what I can experience personally. I can say this much about the shampoo, it is a great feeling scrubbing with it, the salt crystals giving the scalp a nice stimuli. There was a nice lathering and cleansing to my hair. After my hair had dried, there was a nice level of manageability to the hair which some shampoos don't provide. The aroma was pleasant enough that even a guy could use and no be embarrassed.

review_text: Very cute and stylish headband that is also comfortable. I have to wear a mask everyday because I work in a clinic and this is made it easier on my ears. review_text: Everyone knows the saying "Don't put anything in your ear smaller than your elbow." but we all use cotton buds to clean out our ears. Just about every one of these came apart. One I had to have a friend pull out with a pair of tweezers. I was just glad she was home. Years ago they used to make cotton buds with wooden sticks. There was a good reason they stopped and went to a more flexible and softer cardboard. I think these aren't the safest cotton buds on the market. I really don't like these buds, they come apart, the wood doesn't flex and is thin and almost pointy. Not a fan.

review_text:
This was pretty easy to get going. You do need four AA batteries as they are not included. You just untwist the top and pop out the battery top. I did have a little issue putting that piece back on, but if you just push down it will go on to twist closed.

I like that I can use this for sanitizer or soap. It works well so far with no issues.

review_text: Clean fresh scent and well moisturized after using. Not greasy at all, very happy with quality of this product. Sleek packaging and convenient size for car, home, or even keeping in your pockets. I highly recommend.

review_text: I brought the shower caps for my daughter. She long and thick kinky 4c that is about waist length. The shower cap fits perfect. review_text:
I have been using this device for a full three months. I can honestly say that I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs made a whole lot of difference in my under eye area.

The device is easy to use and has different levels. It holds a charge very well. Occasionally I would get a little ‚Äúzap‚Äù but it wasn‚Äôt anything super painful.

This device is pretty expensive. Weighing the cost versus the results, I personally wouldn‚Äôt buy this again.

review_text: Love product
title: Skin care

review_text: While this is a decent costume, it doesn't take much creativity to put it together and comes at a somewhat high price tag. It's $35 at the time of review, which comes with the shirt, wig, wig cap, guitar, and hat. None of it is overly amazing. The hat is pretty cheap while the others are as expected. The shirt is probably the best. Turns out, it's a little more than cotton. It's nice and stretchy. It does fit true to size unlike most tee shirts these days. The mullet looks decent, although you don't need a wig cap for it. It stays on just fine without it. It will make an easy, but somewhat cheap costume if you are in a bind. That said, it does the job.

review_text:
I got this for my 9-year-old son who suffers from very dry and painful skin.

He has been using it at least twice a day and has really noticed a change for the better.

I love the smell. It is perfect and soft, and airy. Really for all ages and genders. It isn't overwhelming.

He really likes it, and since using it, hasn't complained about his skin once.

review_text:
I didn't realize how small this size is haha - definitely travel size.

The product is nice. It has a slight fragrance, nothing too overpowering.

I used this after using a sensory deprivation float pod - i.e. floating in super salty water.

It did seem to help soften my bleached hair.

Overall, i'm happy with this conditioner.

review_text: This make up organizer is perfect for traveling or if you do not have much space for a bigger mirror. It is small enough to carry around and makes applying makeup very easy. I love how it has silicone like holders for your lipsticks or eyeliners and brushes as well as jewelry. This is definitely something worth investing in. I got this so I can take it on the go to retouch my makeup or do it if I need to have it done last min. It is something you can easily store inside your car or office/ work area. I most definitely recommend this to make applying makeup on the go easier.

review_text: Definitely helps with removing oils better than makeup when prepping the eyes before applying lashes. Its a gentle formula and it does not irritate the eyes.

review_text: This product is creamy and luxurious. Takes care of dry skin without a greasy residue. And leaves behind a healthy glow. The definition of a butter, thick but not sticky. And lasts many hours without the need to reapply. Works great for men and women. Doesn't really have a scent. My guy loves it and has stolen mine lol. Guess i will be ordering another real soon! I received this product free of charge in exchange for an honest unbiased review.

When I rinsed it out and towel dried my hair, I could see the curls coming back. The longer I use it, the more it nourishes my hair. I will absolutely get this again and again. Would be nice to have a yummy fragrance but I'm still loving my hair after using this.

review_text:
I spend 99% of my life with chapped lips, so I‚Äôm always looking for a chapstick or lip balm that will actually work.

I was intrigued by the hemp oil in the Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm. But not all of the ingredients are listed in the product information. I am allergic to beeswax, which is the second ingredient in the lip balm. So I was unable to use it.

I‚Äôm including a picture of the tube, but for reference, here are the ingredients: helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, beeswax/cire d‚Äôabeille, olea europaea (extra virgin olive) oil, aroma (flavor), cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, tocopherol (vitamin E), aloe barbadensis.
title: Pharmacopia Tangerine-Flavored Lip Balm

review_text:
Wonderful experience so far! I dye my hair crazy colors about every month. Once in a while I will bleach my locks so the color shows up brighter and lasts longer. This causes some pretty extensive damage. This shampoo is fantastic because it helps heal and restore my strands! The shampoo also doesn't strip off my color! This is very important to me because I always want my dye job to be vivid and last as long as possible. I was worried that the argan oil would make my hair greasy but it doesn't! I naturally have pretty oily hair and it doesn't seem to have any negative impact on that. It makes my hair super soft not oily!

review_text: I got these wipes for a recent road trip.  I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect when I received these but these came in a large plastic pouch, the length which is longer than a sheet of paper.  I like that the pouch is resealable and the wipes are soft.  They have a good amount of liquid.  I think these are great for traveling, and you like to freshen up.

review_text: I was surprised upon receiving it because in the pictures it looks like it comes with a case but it did not. Since this does go in and out of your mouth, a case would be a very good idea for it. Instead it comes with a rubber lanyard to hang around your neck that will tangle and pull your hair if it is long. It does not come with any directions in the tiny box so looking at the ad it says to boil for 20 seconds to help it shape to your mouth. That did nothing and I'm not sure exactly what it is supposed to form. It is not like a mouth guard that adjusts to your mouth. The piece is already shaped and firm with some give when pressure is applied.  It's kind of like a therapeutic squeeze ball for your mouth. I have a very small framed mouth , along with tmj and arthritis in my jaw. I am also a bad grinder. I hoped this would help alleviate some of my daily pain and pressure. So far it has only aggravated my conditions and been uncomfortable but I've only tried it one day so I will give it a little bit more time.
title: My jury is still out on this one.

review_text: Much needed while traveling during this pandemic
title: Much needed

review_text:
The Skinesque Wake Up and Makeup prep facial sheet mast is supposed to detox, moisturize, and anti-age skin. My wife said it did not exfoliate or unclog and minimize pores, as far as she could tell. But it surely moisturized the skin, after using only for 3 minutes. This helps her with her makeup application. She thinks using this in the morning seems to be a great idea! At $27.45 for 30, they're $0.92 each. She thinks that this isn't a great value, but is a fair value.

They come in a box with a built-in tweezer and tweezer holder. The tweezers are used to remove the masks without touching them. The box is made of a heavy plastic, so it doesn't seem to be more ecologically responsible than selling wipes in individual packs.
title: Moisturizes Well, Doesn't Seem to Unclog Pores or Exfoliate Well

review_text: These eyeshadow pens glide on very smoothly. One is a solid color and the other two have shimmer. The 03 color pen is really light. It is shimmery and you primarily only see the shimmer which is okay.
title: Nice but 1 is a bit light on darker skin

review_text:
When I'm at home, I like to wear a subtle lipstick or some moisturizing balm... very dry skin/lips.
I'm liking this lipstick and it's neutral shade for this purpose and I still add a balm for more moisture.

I do find that it doesn't stay long ~ to be fair ~ I'm constantly drinking water or tea, which is another reason I do like this lipstick for its current Black Friday under $10 price.
I am going to order a shade with a little more color to keep in my purse as I'm always re-applying.

As far as the "souffle-like" reference... ???? I'm glad it's a lipstick and not a souffle.

It is indeed very "matte" and having a moisturizing balm on top gives my lips a good feel.
Attractive tube/presentation and love the Black Friday price! I'm ordering the Coral & the Chili now!
title: Shade 01 "My Own Nude" Very Neutral & Subtle:::Just Ordered Two More Shades

review_text: I have tried many brands of dry shampoo, most I have liked.  This product was an adventure. First off, it is literally dry, not in an aerosol type of container.  You screw open the top (like and elmers glue bottle) and shake onto your head. Well. The little safety piece of cardboard was not attached to the bottle but stuck in the lid.  I did not know this until I tried to use it to no avail. And when you open the bottle be prepared for stuff to fly out. When I did get to the point I could use it, it turned out to be so light colored and obvious on my head I had to work it well into my hair, brush and shake my head so it was not such a glaring product. I will admit it did a great job in "thickening" my very fine hair, but it really needs to come in colors; blonde, brunette, etc. so it is not so obvious.  Will I buy it again? Probably not, but it will go into my travel bag for emergency use if I have the time to shake, rattle and roll my head.
title: Decent product but has some issues

review_text: I never thought I would like these.  I mean, come on a roller for your face?  But I admit I was wrong.  The first few times were pleasant.  I used them to spread my face oil around but I read that it's much better if it's cool.  I put it in the fridge for an hour and OMG!  Total turnaround.  The bags under my eyes shrunk a bit but it feels so much better.  I don't see the cosmetic changes but the coolness against my face after a long day at work.  Two thumbs up.
title: Jade Roller for Face

review_text: Used my regular shampoo, then followed up with this hair mask. Left it on for 5 mins and brushed it through my hair with a comb in the shower. The smell is amazing( if you like bananas, which I do ) After washing I let my hair air dry and my hair is so smooth and soft. I also have a nice shine to my hair. I notice with this product a little goes a long way so one bottle can last a while. Never used a hair mask before and I really like the life it gave my hair back.  I will continue to use this 1-2 times a week.
title: Amazing soft smooth hair after use

review_text: My teenager is a nail fanatic, she changes her nail color at least twice a week. She loves using this dryer, it's easy to operate and cuts down on drying time. It was harmless, and it works with all kinds of nail polish, not just Gel. It is really fast and would be great if you are in a hurry. My daughter approves
title: Nail salon quality at home

review_text:
I actually find it to be very soothing for mosquito bites as well as sunburns. A wonderful pump makes it easy to apply. I have sensitive skin and this is a lifesaver. I've tried other aloe and after-sun products that have a bunch of chemicals and are sticky! No this, it glides on so smooth, is clear, and is hydrating and cooling. The pump works well. Not to mention free of chemicals and dyes. I use it when damp from the shower so it glides on easily and has time to dry before getting dressed. Keep it in the fridge for extra cool applications!

Hope you found this review helpful.
title: Lovely healing product :-)

review_text: Although my teen daughter really liked the color, the rest of the product failed her. It was hard to apply, and left her lashes a clumpy mess, not separated, plus it flaked off during the day. It didn't last long, either (but maybe it's an open question whether that is a good or bad thing, given her problems with it).

review_text:
[[VIDEOID:5f47579434e45db7c2dff343fc599ff0]] I just wanted a set that was easy to see (eye issues). I have another pair that are just as good but they are black and I keep losing them. The box the came in is an added bonus. Magnets hold the box closed, and magnets also hold them in place.
Very smart design
2 thumbs up :)

review_text:
I bought these because my pup has weeping eyes, which can cause problems if not taken care of and can also stain his fur. I bought these to help with his weeping eyes and have used them consistently for a few days now. I didn‚Äôt really think a wipe would make that much of a difference, but he doesn‚Äôt look like he has weeping eyes at all unless you look closely.
Aside from weeping eyes, I have found these to be quite handy all around. My pup sometimes has trouble not getting a mess on his fur when pottying and these are clutch in those moments. It is also nice for cleaning off his paws after he has stepped in something that has gotten them dirty.
Overall, I bought these to help me with one purpose - taking care of my pup‚Äôs weepy eyes, but wound up finding them useful in a number of cases. These are definitely worth having and comes in a doubly-sealed package (the snap top and the tap that lifts up and reseals after use), which keeps them fresh. I highly recommend these and will purchase in the future.
title: Extremely handy

review_text:
(A thought: If you think of this as more of a body mist instead of a face mist, you may be happier with it. The strong perfumed scent is a little much to take sprayed directly on the face. However, when after toweling off from a shower, I sprayed this over my body, and even a little on my damp hair before blow-drying, with just a tiny spritz around my face, and it did much better‚ÄîI smelled good and it‚Äôs not as strong as a regular perfume would be.)

I love facial mists. They soothe and calm my skin, and refresh my face, and my mood. I want to give this 4 stars because it seems to be a nice mist, but there are unknowns. I‚Äôm giving it 3 stars based on how I like the feel of it, and the scent, though strong, is nice but a bit much to spray in my face‚Äî

This Valjean face mist in Glow comes in a really nice heavy glass bottle‚ÄîI like glass bottles because I can reuse them, or I can check to make sure they can be recycled, which is important to me. But reusing them by making my own face mist is nice‚Äîwould be great if Valjean offered refillable options so once this bottle is emptied, I can put in more of the same product.

This mist feels amazingly refreshing. You‚Äôll need to note that it has a pretty strong scent. And the scent is kind of a perfume scent; that was a surprise to me. I wasn‚Äôt sure I liked that at first, and still I have to be careful when I spritz it.

However, I like this scent. And though it can seem to be strong when I first spray it, it doesn‚Äôt overpower me or linger too long. If you spray it and it lands on your clothes, the scent will linger longer but it‚Äôs soft and I like the tones of the scent. But, again, on the face I have to be very careful.

There isn‚Äôt a lot of information about the company or the product on this Amazon page, which is puzzling, for I‚Äôd like to know a bit more about the product I‚Äôm putting on my face. I googled the company and couldn‚Äôt find much there either. Except for a dermatology site that indicated the same thing I did: why doesn‚Äôt this company list more about their products.

Am I just spritzing perfumed water on my face with a few minerals added? How much? What‚Äôs the perfume scent? They don‚Äôt even tell me what the scent is. However, on the back of the bottle is the list of ingredients and I suppose that helps. But I‚Äôd like more on this Amazon page, or that I can google.

To that end, I‚Äôll continue to use the facial mist for times I need a boost in mood or I‚Äôm sweaty after a workout or it‚Äôs hot in the summer.
title: Works better as a body mist because of the strong scent.

review_text:
Most of the products that I receive through the Amazon Vine program are decent to excellent, but I sometimes get really bad ones. I never let the fact that I receive the products free affect my ratings. I always call the shots as I see them. This SUPRENT razor is the latest example; its stunning manifestation of idiotic product design catapulted it in one fell swoop to the top of my ignominious list of ‚ÄúWorst Products E-V-E-R!‚Äù

It‚Äôs so bad that I shan‚Äôt waste time enumerating its faults in detail, or in trying to be humorous or clever as I usually do in my reviews. This stinker doesn‚Äôt even warrant the effort it takes to make a bulletized list, but herewith I reluctantly give it that much attention:

- It‚Äôs too heavy to maneuver around the face or wherever.
- The head is too big for precise shaving in tight areas such as under the nose.
- The ‚Äú38.5¬∞ Golden Shaving Angle‚Äù is the wrong angle for just about every surface.
- The worst of its many bone-headed ‚Äúfeatures‚Äù is that the chrome-plated zinc handle is too thin for a firm grip; it slips, slides and spins with Teflon-like frictionlessness in the hand, which is not only annoying but actually dangerous. How could it not occur to the geniuses who designed it that a mirror-smooth chromed metal surface with absolutely NO knurling, stippling or any other texture would be even MORE slippery when held in a wet hand with soapy shaving cream on it? Did anyone even try it out on a real face before they shipped it out the door?
- Speaking of shaving cream, the little can that comes in this set is useless. It‚Äôs as light and insubstantial as NASA Aerogel, and disappears to a thin oily layer when rubbed in. I don‚Äôt know what it is, but it‚Äôs NOT like any other shaving cream that I‚Äôve ever used.
- The huge, unwieldy, six-blade head does NOT glide smoothly across the skin; the blades catch and grab at every opportunity, and do NOT shave closely.
- Since no blade replacements show up on Amazon, they‚Äôre clearly rare, hard to find and, if you can find them, no doubt they‚Äôre obscenely expensive.
- The stylish, oh-so-elegant ‚Äúportfolio‚Äù that accompanies this set is the most pretentious thing that I‚Äôve seen in a long time. I mean, it‚Äôs a RAZOR, not the latest iPad Pro!

Anyone who spends 50 bucks for this set rather than getting it for free will surely be wildly disappointed and probably furious once they realize what they got for their money. It‚Äôs not worth 50 cents. It‚Äôs all about form over function, with form checking in at 100% and function zero.

In the past, I‚Äôve gotten some marginal razors through Vine, but none have been so bad that I‚Äôve thrown them away rather than using them. This one is the exception.

The minimum-allowed one-star rating is far too generous for this ‚Äúobject‚Äù that, whatever it is, doesn‚Äôt qualify as a ‚Äúrazor‚Äù in any practical way. Caveat emptor!
title: Form Over Function, to the Extreme

review_text: This is my first time using essence eyeshadow and it will definitely not be my last. I never really use drug store eyeshadow and to be honest I don't think I have any in my collection.  But if this is the quality I can expect then that is about to change. I'm so impressed with the performance of these shadows! Most of the shades are buttery smooth and pigmented.  The mattes blend out so easily and I didn't get any patchiness. You do have to build these up but that is not necessarily a bad thing. There was quite a bit of kick up in the pan but I didn't get any fallout at all.  This color story is beautiful and even if you aren't a fan of colorful eyeshadow there's still lots to work with. I am very much looking forward to trying more palettes from this brand.
title: I'm impressed!

review_text:
This review is for the foot wipes only. I was intrigued as I do foot masks once a month, and I am always otherwise giving my feet attention every night. Sometimes I take a wash cloth to them, so these wipes are rather convenient when I am sitting in bed ready to lotion up but didnt take a wash cloth to them yet. These are quicker, easier, and nicer feeling than a wet rag. These aren't all that wet but I managed to wipe down both feet effectively enough. 14 wipes, individually wrapped. Suggested that only one wipe per foot.. so seven uses from this box.

The individual packets are convenient but wasteful if not using them on the go. I dont know how much benefit they offer beyond a basic wipe down. Non irritating, non drying. Not loving them enough to be a repurchase.
title: wipes are ok. Convenient, non irritating, effective at quick clean up
